sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react'; import axios from "axios"; const AddUser = () => { const [Nama_Dokumen, setDokumen] = useState(""); const [Nomor_Surat, setSurat] = useState(""); const [Tanggal_Terbit, setTerbit] = useState(""); const [Tanggal_Exp, setExp] = useState(""); const [Link, setLink] = useState(""); const [Keterangan, setKeterangan] = useState(""); const saveUser = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { await axios.post('http://localhost:5001/umst') } catch (error) { } } return (
setDokumen(e.target.value)} placeholder='Nama Dokumen'/>
setSurat(e.target.value)}placeholder='Nomor Surat'/>
setTerbit(e.target.value)}placeholder='Tanggal Terbit'/>
setExp(e.target.value)}placeholder='Tanggal Exp'/>
setLink(e.target.value)}placeholder='Link'/>
setKeterangan(e.target.value)}placeholder='Keterangan'/>
) } export default AddUser
